name: Simple Count Eventbrite Attendees
author: Nuno Morgadinho (based on work by Michael Henke)

sections.description:
This plugin will display a count of atteendes of an Eventbrite event.

For example:

  • Our event will have 14 participants.
  • 31 have registered.
  • 22 boys and girls bought tickets already…

The plugin can be used in a widgetized sidebar or in your theme.

On the configuration panel is also a donation link, so you can chip in if you like.
sections.installation:
Installation is all straight forward.

  1. Download the plugin archive
  2. uncompress archive
  3. Upload archive to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  5. Add widget to your sidebar

short_description: Simple configurable widgetized plugin to display the number of atteendes of an Eventbrite event.
